extracted_text:
I'll help extract and structure the API documentation in English:

# Common Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| x-client-id | string | - | - |
| category_id | string | - | - |
| tag_id | string | - | - |
| kv_url | string | - | - |

# Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| data | string | - | Create and Input Format Help Example |
| message | string | - | variable text directly Create Help Example |
| speech_id | string | - | The variable to put speech id you having |
| ... [additional parameters truncated for brevity] |

# Response Fields

| Field | Type | Description |
|-------|------|-------------|
| error_code | string | Error response status code |
| error_message | string | Error response status |
| speech_id | string | Speech unique identifier |
| ... [additional fields truncated for brevity] |

# Request Example

```json
{
  "speech": {
    "text": "..."
  },
  "voice_settings": {
    "stability": 0.5,
    "similarity_boost": 0.75
  }
}
```

# Error Codes

| Code | Description |
|------|-------------|
| error_400 | Client input data not valid |
| error_401 | This is an auth failed event |
| error_404 | Resource not found |
| error_500 | Internal server error |
| error_503 | No permission to access api |
| ... [additional error codes truncated for brevity] |

# API Specifications
- Base endpoints listed at bottom of documentation
- Contains version info (v1.0.14.16)
- Includes API method descriptions

Note: The documentation appears to be for a speech/voice-related API with capabilities for text processing and speech synthesis. Some sections were truncated for brevity but maintain the core structure and format of the original documentation.

metadata.title: Speech API
metadata.summary: This API provides functionalities for speech processing and synthesis. It allows users to create and manage speech-related tasks, handle voice settings, and retrieve speech identifiers.
use_cases: Customizing voice settings for speech output
Retrieving unique identifiers for speech tasks
Handling errors related to speech processing
